name: MDLSubmeshTopology
desc: A description of how a submesh's index buffer data is arranged and how that arrangement should be used to produce the submesh's intended 3D shape.

items.name: var faceTopology: MDLMeshBuffer?
items.desc: A buffer identifying the faces in the submesh and the number of vertices in each.

items.name: var faceCount: Int
items.desc: The number of faces in the submeshâ€™s face topology buffer.

items.name: var edgeCreaseIndices: MDLMeshBuffer?
items.desc: A buffer containing vertex indices that describe edges to be treated as creases during surface subdivision.

items.name: var edgeCreases: MDLMeshBuffer?
items.desc: A buffer containing sharpness values to be applied to edges during surface subdivision.

items.name: var edgeCreaseCount: Int
items.desc: The number of entries in the edge creases buffers.

items.name: var vertexCreaseIndices: MDLMeshBuffer?
items.desc: A buffer containing vertex indices to be treated as creases during surface subdivision.

items.name: var vertexCreases: MDLMeshBuffer?
items.desc: A buffer containing sharpness values to be applied to points during surface subdivision.

items.name: var vertexCreaseCount: Int
items.desc: The number of entries in the vertex creases buffers.

items.name: var holes: MDLMeshBuffer?
items.desc: An index buffer identifying faces to be treated as holes in the mesh during surface subdivision.

items.name: var holeCount: Int
items.desc: The number of entries in the holes buffer.
